docs.lead_paragraph: Decades after New York emptied its warehouses for the disabled, the current network of small group homes operates with scant oversight and few consequences for abusive employees.

headline.sub: Problem Workers Shuffled, Not Fired, in New York System for Disabled ;
headline.print_headline: At State-Run Homes, Abuse and Impunity
headline.seo: For the Developmentally Disabled, Harm in Safe Havens
headline.main: At State-Run Homes, Abuse and Impunity
